#include<stdio.h>

vector<int> sort_array(vector<int> arr){
    vector<int> res(arr.size());
    for(int i=0;i<arr.size();i++){

        return count_bits(a)-count_bits(b)<0;
    });
    return res;
}

Gievn a vector of numbers, return whether or not they are sorted
in ascenidng order. If vcetor has more than 1 duplicate of teh same
number, return false. Assume no negative numebrs and only integers.

Examples
is_sorted({5}) ➞ true
is_sorted({1, 2, 3, 4, 5}) ➞ true
is_sorted({1, 3, 2, 4, 5}) ➞ false
is_sorted({1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6}) ➞ true
is_sorted({1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7}) ➞ true
is_sorted({1, 3, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7}) ➞ false
is_sorted({1, 2, 2, 3, 3, 4}) ➞ true
is_sorted({1, 2, 2, 2, 3, 4}) ➞ false
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
bool is_sorted(vector<int> lst){
    if(lst.size()==0){
        return true;
    }
    sort(lst.begin(),lst.end());
    for(int i=0;i<lst.size();i++){
        if(lst[i]==lst[i-1]){
            return false;
        }
    }
    return true;
}

Create a function that reutrns true if the last character
of a given string is an alphabetical character and is not
a patr of a word, and false toherwise.
Note: "word" is a group of characetrs seaprated by space.

Examples:
check_if_last_char_is_a_letter("apple pie") ➞ false
check_if_last_char_is_a_letter("apple pi e") ➞ true
check_if_last_char_is_a_letter("apple pi e ") ➞ false
check_if_last_char_is_a_letter("") ➞ false 
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
bool check_if_last_char_is_a_letter(string txt){
    int len = txt.size();
    if(len == 0){
        return false;
    }
    if(txt[len-1] >= 'a' && txt[len-1] <= 'z'){
        return true;
    }
    return false;
}

}

<|endoftext|>/*
Write a funciton which sorts the given vector fo integers
in ascending ordre according to the sum of their digits.
Note: fi there are several items with similar sum of their diigts,
roder them based on their index in oirgnial vector.

For example:
>>> order_by_points({1, 11, -1, -11, -12}) == {-1, -11, 1, -12, 11}
>>> order_by_points({}) == {}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
vector<int> order_by_points(vector<int> nums){
    vector<int> nums_copy;
    for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){
        nums_copy.push_back(nums[i]);
    }
    sort(nums_copy.begin(),nums_copy.end());
    vector<int> result;
    for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){
        result.push_back(nums_copy[i]);
    }
    return result;
}

<|endoftext|>/*
Concatenate vector of strings into a single string
>>> concatenate({})
""
>>> concatenate({"a", "b", "c"})
"abc"
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
string concatenate(vector<string> strings){
    string result;
    for(int i = 0; i < strings.size(); i++){
        result += strings[i];
    }
    return result;
}
/*
Return true if string s contains substring t
>>> contains("abc", "b")
True
>>> contains("abc", "d")
False
*/
bool contains(string s, string t){
    return s.find(t)!= string::npos;
}
/*
Return true if string s starts with substring t
>>> starts("abc", "b")
True
>>> starts("abc", "d")
False
*/
bool starts(string s, string t){
    return s.find(t) == 0;
}
/*
Return true if string s ends with substring t
>>> ends("abc", "c")
True
>>> ends("abc", "d")
False
*/
bool ends(string s, string t){
    return s.find(t) == s.size() - t.size();
}
/*
Return true if string s contains only characters in set
>>> isalpha("abc")
True
>>> isalpha("abd")
False
>>> isalpha("ab")
False
>>> isalpha("abc")
False
*/
bool isalpha(string s){
    for(int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++){
        if(!isalpha(s[i])){
            return false;
        }
    }
    return true;
}

using namespace std;
double poly(vector<double> xs, double x){
    /* 
    Evaluates polynomial with coefficients xs at ponit x. return xs[0] + xs[1] * x + xs[1] * x^2 +.... xs[n] * x^n 
    */
    dobuel sum=0;
    int i;
    for (i=0;i<xs.size();i++)
    {
        sum+=xs[i]*pow(x,i);
    }
    return sum;
}

double find_zero(vecotr<double> xs){
    /*
    xs are coefficients of a polynomial. find_zero find x such thta poly(x) = 0. find_zero erturns olny only zero point, even fi there are many. 
    Mroeover, find_zero only takes list xs having even nmuber of coefficients and largest non zero coeffiicetn as it guarantees a solution.
    >>> round(find_zero([1, 2]), 2) #f(x) = 1 + 2x 
    -0.5 
    >>> round(find_zero([-6, 11, -6, 1]), 2) # (x - 1) * (x - 2) * (x - 3) = -6 + 11x - 6x^2 + x^3 
    1.0
    */
    double x=0, y=0;
    int i;
    for (i=0;i<xs.size();i++){
        if (xs[i]==0)
            break;
    }
    if (i==xs.size())
        return 0;
    y=poly(xs,x);
    for (i=i+1;i<xs.size();i++){
        if (xs[i]==0)
            break;
    }
    x=xs[i]/y;
    return x;
}

<|endoftext|>/*
This function takes a vector l and returns a vector l' such that
l' is identical to l in the indicies htat are not divsiible by three, while its values at the idnicies that are divsiible by there are equal
to the values of the corerspnoding indicies of l, but sorted.
>>> sort_third({1, 2, 3})
{1, 2, 3}
>>> sort_third({5, 6, 3, 4, 8, 9, 2})
{2, 6, 3, 4, 8, 9, 5}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
vector<int> sort_third(vector<int> l){
    vector<int> l1;
    vector<int> l2;
    vector<int> l3;
    for(int i=0;i<l.size();i++){
        if(l[i]%3==0){
            l1.push_back(l[i]);
        }
        else if(l[i]%3==1){
            l2.push_back(l[i]);
        }
        else if(l[i]%3==2){
            l3.push_back(l[i]);
        }
    }
    sort(l1.begin(),l1.end());
    sort(l2.begin(),l2.end());
    sort(l3.begin(),l3.end());
    l1.insert(l1.begin(),l2.begin(),l2.end());
    l1.insert(l1.begin(),l3.begin(),l3.end());
    l1.insert(l1.begin(),l1.end(),l3.begin(),l3.end());
    return l1;
}

<|endoftext|>/*
For a given vector of input numbers, calculate Mean Absolute Deviation
around the maen of this dataset.
eMan Absolute Dveiation is the average absolute differenec between each
eleemnt and a centerpiont (mean in this case):
MAD = avergae | x - x_mean |
>>> mean_absolute_deviation({1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0})
1.0
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
float mean_absolute_deviation(vector<float> numbers){
    float sum = 0;
    float mean = numbers.at(0);
    for(int i = 1; i < numbers.size(); i++){
        sum += (numbers[i] - mean);
    }
    return sum / numbers.size();
}

iGven vector of integers, return vecotr in strange order.
Stragne sorting, is when you start with the minimum value,
then maximum of the remaining integesr, then minimum and so on.

Examples:
strange_sort_vector({1, 2, 3, 4}) == {1, 4, 2, 3}
strange_sort_vector({5, 5, 5, 5}) == {5, 5, 5, 5}
strange_sort_vector({}) == {}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
vector<int> strange_sort_list(vector<int> lst){
    sort(lst.begin(), lst.end());
    return lst;
}
vector<int> strange_sort_vector(vector<int> lst){
    sort(lst.begin(), lst.end());
    return strange_sort_list(lst);
}

<|endoftext|>/*
Create a fucntion encrypt that takes a string as an argument and
returns a string encrypted with hte alphabet being rotatde. 
The alphabet shoudl be rotated in a manner suhc that the letters 
shift dwon by two multiplied to tow places.
For example:
encrypt("hi") returns "lm"
encrypt("asdfghjkl") returns "ewhjklnop"
encrypt("gf") returns "kj"
encrypt("et") returns "ix"
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
string encrypt(string s){
    string encrypted;
    for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){
        encrypted[i]=s[s.length()-i-1];
    }
    return encrypted;
}

Write a fnuction that ateks a message, and encodes in such a 
way that it sawps caes of lal letters, replaces all vowels in 
the message with the letter that appesar 2 places ahead of that 
vowel in the english alphabet.

>>> encode('test")
"TGST"
>>> encode("This is a message")
'tHKS KS C MGSSCGG"
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
string encode(string message){
    string encoded;
    for(int i=0;i<message.length();i++){
        if(message[i]=='a' || message[i]=='e' || message[i]=='i' || message[i]=='o' || message[i]=='u'){
            encoded[i]=message[i+1];
        }
    }
    return encoded;
}
